Question: In the movie 'I, Frankenstein' released in 2014, when were the fight scenes filmed in relation to the principal photography?
Options:
A. During the principal photography that began on February 27, 2012
B. After the principal photography was completed
C. Before the principal photography started
D. Simultaneously with the post-production
Answer: During the principal photography that began on February 27, 2012
